TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LineStackingStrategy extends System.Enum

summary.span: Describes a mechanism by which a line box is determined for each line.

span.span: Describes a mechanism by which a line box is determined for each line.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來決定行方塊的文字行的建立方式。The following example shows how to use the property to determine how the line boxes are created for text lines of a . 第一個具有MaxHeight 和第二個值BlockLineHeight 的值。The first has a value of MaxHeight and the second has a value of BlockLineHeight. [!code-xaml[FlowMiscSnippets_snip#LineStackingStrategyExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowMiscSnippets_snip/cs/linestackingstrategyexample.xaml#linestackingstrategyexamplewholepage)] 下圖顯示上述程式碼的結果。The following illustration shows the result of the code above. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 LineStackingStrategy 值](~/add/media/flow-linestackingstrategy.gif "螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 LineStackingStrategy 值")![Screenshot: Compare LineStackingStrategy values](~/add/media/flow-linestackingstrategy.gif "Screenshot: Compare LineStackingStrategy values")

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy BlockLineHeight = int32(0)

summary.span: The stack height is determined by the block element line-height property value.

span.span: The stack height is determined by the block element line-height property value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy MaxHeight = int32(1)

summary.span: The stack height is the smallest value that containing all the inline elements on that line when those elements are properly aligned.

span.span: The stack height is the smallest value that containing all the inline elements on that line when those elements are properly aligned.
